MegaZoneHosting – New Reseller Hosting Offers including Dedicated IP from $10/annually + VPS Plans & more!

buffalo, chicago, cpanel, credit card, ipv4, megazonehosting, new york, openvz, paypal, reseller, whm November 4, 2018 @ 10:00 pm, by Nick

We recently heard from Brad over at MegaZoneHosting, they might be a familiar name to you as we’ve featured their offers a couple times in the past, and they’ve persistently received positive feedback from the community. Today, Brad is back with a new offer, which he sounded confident was the “The Best Value Reseller on The Planet” offer you could find out in the marketplace. We thought the offer looked pretty intriguing and wanted to share it with all, considering it included a Dedicated IP from prices starting at just $10 a year.

Their WHOIS is public and you can find their ToS/Legal Docs here. They accept PayPal, Cryptocurrency and Credit Cards as payment methods.

Here’s what they had to say: 

“Hello LEB’ers, we are glad to be back here with some new deals! The “Best Value cPanel Reseller Hosting” from MegaZoneHosting is finally here, and it provides the perfect combination of security, SSD performance, hundreds of features, and value-packed cost for anyone looking to sell or create cPanel web hosting accounts!

Our new reseller hosting specials start from just $10/year, and best of all, all packages include a Dedicated IP address. Certainly, one of these packages are a perfect fit for any sized business to host their own websites, manage a portfolio of websites, resell hosting for others as a design or marketing agency, or even for those looking to start their own web hosting business.

The reseller hosting packages includes the award-winning cPanel/WHM, enterprise-grade server hardware, and everything is powered by RAID-10 SSD drives for the best performance possible.

With reseller hosting accounts, we monitor and take care of your server so you can focus on running your business – leave the infrastructure, software updates, security, backups, and uptime to us. We provide an out of the box, headache-free solution so you can focus on running your business and easily satisfy your customers. By choosing MegaZoneHosting, you will receive 24×7 access to our technical support engineers which are available to assist you every step of the way, which is far more cost-effective when compared to hiring your own team of tech gurus.

For those who are looking for root access, we also have VPS plans starting at just $14 per year.”

Here’s the offers:
